text:
Inland Fisheries Amendment Regulations 2023

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 .

7 August 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

JO PALMER

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Inland Fisheries Amendment Regulations 2023 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which their making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Inland Fisheries Regulations 2019 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries Regulations 2019 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries Regulations 2019 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 August 2023

These regulations are administered in the Department of Natural Resources and Environment Tasmania.
